>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
Have you installed 3.2.1 over a previous version of eclipse?

(In reply to comment #1)
> Have you installed 3.2.1 over a previous version of eclipse?
> 

I have installed eclipse in a new directory, and choosen a separate workspace.

On my PC, there are 4 diff?rent versions of eclipses, all of them work fine till i install my eclipse.
Now, even the 3.2.0 does no more work.
Is it myeclipse causing this??
I have uninstalled myeclipse. Nothing is better.

Eclipse requires a 1.4.2 or higher VM. From you log it looks like you are using
1.4.1.

Exact, RESOLVED

I have puttin a jre in my eclipse directory, and everything gone well.

So, solution, wether you have a 1.4.2 on your disk, or a 1.4.2 in your eclipse directory.

Thank you
